Maria Gonzalez, born in 1967, is an enthusiastic editor at Air Forces Monthly magazine, where she's dedicated to delivering the latest and most insightful articles about aviation and military technology. With over three decades of experience in journalism, Maria is known for her meticulous attention to detail and her ability to transform complex information into engaging content. Beyond her professional life, she enjoys attending air shows and visiting aviation museums, always eager to learn more and share her discoveries with readers. Maria balances her demanding career with family life, cherishing time spent with her children and grandchildren, passing down her love of aviation to the next generation.
